data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Espaillat, Dominican Republic.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Espaillat, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Espaillat, Dominican Republic to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Espaillat, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Espaillat, Dominican Republic with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Japanese people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Japanese people know you.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Espaillat do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Espaillat to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.section_summary:
the state of Espaillat, Dominican Republic has a population of 225,100.

We estimate Espaillat has 24,399 people who might know Jesus, 186,728 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 13,973 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 24,399 believers in Espaillat.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

location.name: Espaillat
location.cities_list: Moca, Gaspar Hernández, Veragua Arriba, San Víctor Arriba, Cayetano Germosén
